commenter_b: I agree! There are plenty of legitimate issues that should convince anyone paying attention that Clinton does not belong in the White House. I'm not saying that I don't think her health may be an issue, or even that it shouldn't even be written about, but there are 100 different reasons for a vehicle like that to include a wheelchair lift.
